title: Short* Cold War 2.0 - Episode 7 | 9 - 15
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary:
For the Full episode:  Jeff discusses the Ukrainian Offensive, the Possibility of a Russian Nuclear Response, Russia Buying arms from North Korea, China's doubts about Russia, an opportunistic Saudi Arabia and more.

To get the full episode, become a patreon subscriber here: www.patreon.com/coldwarpodcast
